Texts.Chs:
一杯啤酒。酒精含量相对较低。
^cyan;+^white;3^cyan;防御^gray;(^white;持续45s^gray;)
^white;35%^red;减速^gray;(^white;持续10s^gray;)
^red;醉酒^gray;(^white;持续10s^gray;)^reset;
Texts.Eng:
A mug of lager. The alcohol content is relatively low.
^cyan;+^white;3 ^cyan;Defense ^gray;(^white;45s^gray;)
^white;35% ^red;Slow ^gray;(^white;10s^gray;)
^red;Drunk ^gray;(^white;25s^gray;)^reset;
